main event: A round, long, silvery object with a flame and smoke trail was observed for 5-8 seconds in the sky over Washington D.C.
interesting points: The object turned and disappeared at an altitude of approximately 5,000 feet.
The object crossed the observer's flight path at around the same time as the sighting.
A control tower operator at Washington National Airport reported seeing a vapor trail in the same general direction prior to this sighting.
The object was moving slowly at first before turning and disappearing.
sighted object: a round, long, silvery object with a flame and smoke trail
